introduction: You must register with your council's environmental health service at least 28 days before you open your business.
more_information:
You will have to register each business premises you're opening. There is no charge for registering.

You can also read the [detailed guidance for food businesses](http://food.gov.uk/enforcement/enforceessential/startingup/ "Food Standards Agency"){:rel="external"} from the Food Standards Agency.
overview: Register with your council's environmental health service before you open your business; you have 28 days to register when you open a food retailer or catering business
title: Register as a food retailer or caterer
